metadata.inclusion: To add a device to the Z-Wave network, press the “Inclusion” button in the Android Controller Application
metadata.exclusion: To remove a device from the Z-Wave network, press the “Exclusion” button in the Android Controller Application
metadata.reset: Press “RESET” in the Factory Default Reset dialog. This will reset the Z- Wave chip, and the gateway will show “DEVICE RESET LOCALLY NOTIFICATION” after the restart
